title: Ventilation Validation CNNs
summary: Developed an image processing pipeline using deep neural networks with Python and scikit-learn that provides efficient evaluation of lung health for clinical practices. Implemented multi-center datasets to address network sensitivity to varied training data.

title: Meal Buddy AI
summary: Built a cross-platform React Native recipe-recommendation app with Hugging Face Transformers model integration for personalization. Implemented camera system with barcode scanning to pull recipe data via REST API.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
summary: A full-stack, fully-responsive personal portfolio website show-casing myself

title: Discord Server Bot
summary: A fun interactive discord bot that provides 140+ users with a unique experience

title: OS Chat Room App
summary: Multi-user multi-transaction application that implements concepts of thread synchronization (semaphores), multithreading and socket programming
